Focus Foundation of Arizona connects skilled educators to youth in need.  They believe in the power of education to inspire all students.  Focus Foundation matches kids in need with skilled educators to help fill in the gap of their educational needs by partnering with organizations that assist homeless and foster youth.I am proud to be a Board Member of this amazing organization.

Arizona Department of Administration - Arizona Strategic Enterprise Technology Office (ADOA-ASET)In alignment with the strategic missions of state agencies, ADOA-ASET develops and executes the statewide information technology strategy, as well as provides capabilities, services and infrastructure to ensure the continuity of mission critical and essential systems for the state of Arizona.Currently, I am the Chief Strategy Office for the Arizona State Enterprise Technology (ASET) office and also act as the state's Deputy CIO.  I lead the group called Strategic Transformation and Innovation (STI) within ASET.STI sets the technology, security, privacy, and communication strategies, policies, and procedures for the state of Arizona. In addition, it is the body responsible for monitoring and overseeing high-risk technology projects across all state agencies. Lastly, it manages several large, state-wide programs and initiatives such as Digital Government, State 911, the Health Information Exchange, and Broadband.

After rounding out my professional experience in a sales role, I returned back to Product Management.  I reported directly to the VP of Product Management and managed a portfolio that includes five products.  As part of my ongoing professional growth, I completed my Pragmatic Marketing certification.

As part of an acquisition in late 2008, Syntellect acquired an established group of channel partners (resellers, VARs, OEMs, ISVs/ISPs, etc.).  A team was set up to manage the entire channel and I took over the position of Director of Channels for North America and Latin America.  The group is responsible for maintaining and growing the business in these regions.

May 12, 2015, Phil managed Michael directly

I was fortunate to have Michael work for me at the State of Arizona.  I was immediately impressed with Michael’s professionalism and management skills.  When an issue arose, I would discuss it with Michael and he would immediately address it.  As an executive, there is nothing more comforting than having a manager who knows how to handle any situation.  I had the utmost confidence in Michael and mostly just tried to stay out of his way and let him do his job.Michael exudes incredible passion in everything he does and that commitment shows in his work.  He is a results-driven individual.  Michael does not just talk about accomplishing something; he gets it done.  And the quality of his work is exceptional.  I have tremendous respect for Michael and would highly recommend him for any senior-level position in your organization.

Natalie Beneventi
Public Affairs Specialist at Administrative Office of the United States Courts
November 21, 2014, Phil was senior to Natalie but didn’t manage directly

I had the pleasure to work with Natalie over the past couple of years.  First of all, she is an extremely talented designer and has done a great job of making even the most dry and boring content look good!  I have been so impressed with her skills that I asked her to design Arizona's Statewide IT Strategic Plan and she knocked it out of the park.  Natalie was also instrumental in designing the new AZ.gov and multiple state agency website themes.  She worked closely with our vendor to ensure the designs of the new sites were clean and fresh.  And finally, she oversaw the program in which a partner migrated more than 75 agencies to the new website themes.Natalie has an amazing attitude and demeanor.  No matter how tense a situation is, or how upset a customer may be, Natalie never loses her composure.  She is literally customer-centric to her core.  Natalie is always going above and beyond to help her customers, both internally and externally.  I can undoubtedly say that Natalie has been critical to the overall success of our organization and although she did not report directly to me, I would hire her in a heartbeat!

summary: "I get up every morning determined to both change the world and have one hell of a good time. Sometimes this makes planning my day difficult." - E.B. WhiteAs this quote implies, I am passionate about every thing I do. As an innovative, inspirational leader with over 15 years of experience, I have proven I can successfully transform organizations into high-performance, self-sustaining machines.I recently co-founded Zuggand® with Aaron Sandeen and Kiran Chinnagangannagari.  Zuggand® is a technology and digital marketing services firm specializing in Cloud, IoT, Analytics, and Digital Marketing.  We help brands transform their business using modern digital technologies.
name: Phil Manfredi
title: Co Founder & COO at Zuggand
